backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for competitions, results, payments, and comparison utilities, including event ordering and public-facing structures.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration from old competition data to a new format by adding registrationStartDate while preserving existing fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to frontend file changes, components used, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, and hooks used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using CSS layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx and hosts the root div.
frontend/public/env.json: Stores environment configuration including backend canister ID.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Contains Razorpay payment widget configuration such as keyId, currency, and theme.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Provides a manual regression checklist covering authentication, admin access, competitions, leaderboards, and user management.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user‑friendly strings with fallback handling for unknown errors.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable React Query cache keys and key generator functions for competitions, profiles, results, admin data, and solve sessions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app’s routing tree, query client, and theme provider, defining all public and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: UI component for selecting and configuring competition pricing modes, syncing fee mode changes to the parent.
Protects admin‑only routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loaders or an access‑denied message when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and shows a login prompt or loading state when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Clickable card displaying key competition info such as status, dates, events, and participant limit, navigating to its details.
Main app layout providing header navigation, admin access links, authentication controls, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitor names, Ao5, and solve times with navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays the user's payment history with sorting, loading states, and detailed payment cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a user dropdown menu with profile info, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a modal for new users to enter email and display name and submit profile creation.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements the WCA-style 15-second inspection timer with penalty and DNF handling.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a completion screen after all solves with navigation options and video evidence instructions.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Interactive solve timer component that tracks elapsed time and triggers onComplete when stopped.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays a connection error message with guidance and a retry button.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads and caches Razorpay config from a JSON file with a fallback default.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload listener to warn users when leaving with unsaved progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the active backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages simulated deployment steps, tracking statuses, errors, and diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, and identity management.
Blocks browser navigation when enabled, prompting the user to confirm leaving.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching competitions, results, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Defines leaderboard types and computes average of 5 attempts with DNF handling.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Provides helpers to detect paid competitions and format/display pricing from fee modes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to CSV, escapes values, and includes generic CSV generation/download utilities.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human‑readable date and date-time strings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates deployment steps with callbacks, random failures, and error normalization utilities.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for config files, Razorpay setup, connectivity, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay script and opens the checkout UI using configured payment options.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab-scoped solve session tokens using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into readable strings with DNF handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays all competitions for admins with actions to delete, lock/unlock, and activate/deactivate items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create a new competition, configure events, scrambles, dates, and fee modes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition’s details, events, scrambles, dates, and fees.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs deployment-related preflight checks and step-by-step go‑live operations with diagnostics and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard linking to management sections and quick actions like creating competitions or initiating deployment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin interface for filtering competition results, toggling visibility, and exporting them to CSV.
Admin dashboard for listing users and performing actions like block, delete, reset competition status, and viewing solve history.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Shows competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting a solve session.
Lists competitions grouped by status with loading state and competition cards.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays event leaderboards for a competition, including ranks, times, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Shows all competitions with quick access to their leaderboards, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile and see payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Displays a public user profile with stats and event results grouped by event.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the full solve attempt flow including session recovery, inspection, timing, and submission for competition events.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Type definitions for admin-related data structures such as results, public profiles, and user summaries.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Locally extended backend type definitions including competitions, results, leaderboards, and session state.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Provides event labels and constants defining available events and the default event.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, architecture, features, and known issues for the speedcubing platform.
